title: Bikerumor merges with GearJunkie, Switchback Travel & more!
content:
Bikerumor has joined Lola Digital Media, aligning with leading outdoor sites like GearJunkie, Switchback Travel, AutoWise, iRunFar, and others to create the AllGear Media Group. I’m very happy and proud to say that our entire team – Zach, Cory, Jessie-May, Steve, Jordan, Kristi, and the rest of the crew (including me) – are all still […]

The post Bikerumor merges with GearJunkie, Switchback Travel & more! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
